row2k results

High School/Scholastic
NEIRA Boys & Girls Fours,Notre Dame Invite #1: Notre Dame vs. Hotchkiss vs. Middletown vs. Greenwich Country Day School
April 20, 2025 - Shelton, CT (Housatonic River)
Submitted by Joe Connors
Distance: 1500m
Conditions: All races into an outgoing head current on the river. Light cross/ tail wind for all races. G1 and B1 had small chop starting to build.
Comments: Great Racing by all today!
RESULTS
Men's Racing
First Boat:
Hotchkiss 5:16.57
Notre Dame WH 5:19.00
Middletown 5:50.68
Second Boat:
Hotchkiss 6:05.01
Notre Dame WH 6:11.21
Middletown 6:22.07
Third Boat:
Hotchkiss 6:16.15
Middletown 7:37.06
Fourth Boat:
Notre Dame WH 6:29.81
Middletown 6:54.21
Hotchkiss 7:17.58
Greenwich Country Day 7:25.53

Women's Racing
First Boat:
Hotchkiss 6:03.24
Middletown 6:30.09
Greenwich Country Day 6:49.10
Second Boat:
Hotchkiss 6:20.17
Middletown 7:03.27
Third Boat:
Hotchkiss 6:43.73
Middletown 8:14.13
Fourth Boat:
Hotchkiss 6:49.60
Greenwich Country Day 7:32.53
